paper_abstract: We describe a universal Grobner basis of relations among conditional probabilities in a discrete probability space, with any set of conditioned-upon events. They may be specialized to the partially-observed random variable case, the purely conditional case, and other special cases. We also investigate the connection to generalized permutohedra and describe a "conditional probability simplex" which is the image of a multigraded moment map. (C) 2012 Elsevier B.V.
